Texts:
Your great, great, great, grandfather and the rest of the crew had to live and work on their sailing-ship for months and months on end, so they loaded the inside of the ship with enough food and water and all the other things they would need for such a long journey.  The <color=red>sailing-ship</color=red> had three tall masts and big white sails.  As soon as the crew had finished loading all their gear, they set sail for India.

They sailed for nearly a year before they arrived and I can tell you they had some great adventures on the way, but I will save those stories for another day."
“Bhí ar do shin-sin-sin-seanathair agus an chuid eile den chriú a bheith ag obair agus ina gcónaí ar a longseoil ar feadh na míonna, mar sin bhí an longseoil lán le go leor bia agus uisce agus gach rud eile a bheadh de dhíth don turas fada seo.  Bhí trí chrann seoil agus seolta móra, bána ag an <color=red>longseoil</color=red>.  Chomh luath is a bhí siad críochnaithe ag pacáil, d’ardaigh siad na seolta d’India.

Sheol siad  ar feadh beagnach bliain sular tháinig siad agus is féidir liom a chur in iúl duit go raibh eachtraí iontacha acu ar an mbealach, ach sábháilfaidh mé na scéalta sin do lá eile."
